ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL(Web_Status__c, 'In Progress') || ISPICKVAL(Web_Status__c, 'Live')) && (ISBLANK(Display_Name__c) || ISBLANK(Event_Start_Date__c) || ISBLANK(Event_End_Date__c) || ISBLANK(Banner_URL__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Display Name, Event Start Date, Event End Date, and Banner URL must contain a value when changing Web Status.
